[Lecture Slides](https://clanfear.github.io/ioc_crmw/_lectures/2_quantitative-data-management/slides_quantitative-data-management.html)

Required Readings:

* Quartz. *The Quartz guide to bad data.* https://github.com/Quartz/bad-data-guide
   * “An exhaustive reference to problems seen in real-world data along with suggestions on how to resolve them.”
   * Don’t read this thoroughly, but browse through it a bit!

* Wickham, H. and Grolemund, G. (2022) *R for Data Science.* Sebastopol, CA: O’Reilly. https://r4ds.hadley.nz/ 

* Robinson, D. *Tidy Tuesday live screencasts.* https://www.youtube.com/@safe4democracy/streams 
   * Livestreamed data cleaning and analysis videos. See also https://www.youtube.com/@JuliaSilge 

* Data Carpentry. (2022) *Social Science Curriculum.* https://datacarpentry.org/lessons/#social-science-curriculum 
   * Recommended workshop rather than reading; look for upcoming workshops!
